'''''Minas Tirith Evening-Star'' (Volume 12, Number 2)''' is an issue of the journal ''[[Minas Tirith Evening-Star]]'', published by the [[American Tolkien Society]].

Contents include reviews, poetry, and "Tengwaquenta" by Philip Helms.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.americantolkiensociety.org/backissues.htm|articlename=Available Back Issues of Minas Tirith Evening Star|dated=|website=[http://www.americantolkiensociety.org/ AmericanTolkienSociety.org]|accessed=11 August 2013}}</ref>
